target: The Bhutanese believe them to be the aboriginal inhabitants of the country.
context: ['The Lhop or Doya people are a little-known tribe of southwest Bhutan.']

target: However, folklorist Katherine Luomala believes that the legends of the Menehune and similar creatures are a post-European contact mythology.
context: ["In Hawaiian mythology, the Nawao are a legendary people, a wild, large-sized hunting people, descended from Lua-nu'u (Beckwith 1970:321-323).", 'Other sources suggest that the Nawao were present in Hawaii before the Menehune who are thought to have driven them out or destroyed them.']
